# Android PDF Annotation App

## Project Overview
Android app for PDF annotation with stylus support for Xiaomi Pad 6.

## Project Status
- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file
- [x] Scaffold Android project structure
- [x] Implement PDF viewer with drawing
- [x] Add save functionality
- [x] Create README documentation

## Project Details
- **Target Device**: Xiaomi Pad 6 with stylus pen
- **Language**: Kotlin
- **Min SDK**: 24 (Android 7.0)
- **Target SDK**: 34 (Android 14)
- **Features**: PDF viewing, stylus drawing with pressure sensitivity, save annotated PDFs
